thread.title: PHOTOS: Salman Khan Is In Maldives To Celebrate Nephew Ahil Sharma’s First Birthday
thread.title_full: PHOTOS: Salman Khan Is In Maldives To Celebrate Nephew Ahil Sharma’s First Birthday

author: Team MissMalini
title: PHOTOS: Salman Khan Is In Maldives To Celebrate Nephew Ahil Sharma’s First Birthday
text:
Team MissMalini Mar . 30 . 2017 
Salman Khan and his family are on a family vacation in Maldives to celebrate sister Arpita Khan Sharma ‘s son, Ahil ’s first birthday. Salman and the rest of the family including Arbaaz Khan , Malaika Arora , Alvira Khan and husband Atul Agnihotri , Amrita Arora , Salma Khan , Helen and rumoured girlfriend Iulia Vantur are chilling at the scenic location. Check out these photos of the Khan clan ringing in Ahil’s birthday: A post shared by Arpita Khan Sharma (@arpitakhansharma) on Mar 29, 2017 at 7:06am PDT A post shared by Arpita Khan Sharma (@arpitakhansharma) on Mar 29, 2017 at 7:33am PDT A post shared by Arpita Khan Sharma (@arpitakhansharma) on Mar 29, 2017 at 2:16pm PDT A post shared by Arpita Khan Sharma (@arpitakhansharma) on Mar 29, 2017 at 2:23pm PDT A post shared by Arpita Khan Sharma (@arpitakhansharma) on Mar 29, 2017 at 11:48pm PDT A post shared by Amilla Fushi, Maldives (@amillafushi) on Mar 29, 2017 at 8:56am PDT A post shared by Ahil Sharma (@ahilsharma30) on Mar 29, 2017 at 12:54pm PDT A post shared by Ahil Sharma (@ahilsharma30) on Mar 29, 2017 at 1:13pm PDT A post shared by Ahil Sharma (@ahilsharma30) on Mar 29, 2017 at 1:18pm PDT 
Isn’t he adorable? Happy birthday, little one! 
P.S – Salman, who is busy shooting for Tiger Zinda Hai , in Austria flew across the globe on a 22-hour long flight to celebrate Ahil’s birthday. How sweet of Sallu mama , right? 1
